item.description:
The Return of Google Analytics is finally BACK!

It sure was a rough winter and now we can almost say it's getting warm around Boston...

Anyone remember what happened back on February 2nd?    And then getting us all re-aligned to present; along with a new venue, proved to be quite an undertaking - but we're back!

We've had a lot of requests for more analytics presentations so we thought we'd pull this one together as part of a series of sessions leading up to another big presentation for FutureM week coming in September.  Digging deep into Google Analytics helps you discover so many excellent insights for your website & your business; unfortunately too many people either don't ever implement this free tool or do not effectively use it to help gain crucial business knowledge that will drive new business. 

Our Meetup mission is to deliver simple, basic starting steps to allow you to take action as soon as you leave our session with a road map and the action steps to accomplish your goals.  Join us for an informative session.

We'll be doing a Google BASICS presentation covering:

Google Fast Start #1 - 5 steps to Get Going

Google Analytics ~ What's Important! - 5 Key Analytics Reports & how to read them.

Google Adwords ~ PPC Case Study - 5 things you need to know to succeed.

 

Many thanks to the Adam @ Foley Hoag for hosting us -

Please join us after the presentation for more networking, lively internet marketing conversation (plus all the questions you can throw at us) and a spectacular location on the Boston waterfront - Jerry Remy's Seaport Sports Bar & Grill  250 Northern Ave.

http://www.jerryremysseaport.com/

 

Stay tuned for our next events too:

June 29th - What to do with Google Places

July 27th - the 'Kayak' event on the Cambridge Waterfront
item.name: Return of Google Analytics - We're Back (...to the Basics)
